step_heading: Adliya Par Sharif Khandan Ka Control
text: Sharif khandan ne Pakistan mein apni 'sultanat' qaim ki, jahan qanoon aur merit ke bajaye zaati orders aur wafadari ko tarjeeh di jati thi. Yeh control sirf bureaucracy aur police tak mehdood nahi tha, balkay adliya bhi is ke asar se mehfooz nahi thi. Unhone aise afsaran aur judges ko tarjeeh di jo unke wafaadar the aur unke ghair-qanooni ahkamaat bajane mein hichkichate nahi the. Is tareeqay se, Sharif khandan ne aik aisa nizam qaim kiya jahan idare unke zaati faiday ke liye istemal hotay the, na ke awam ki khidmat ke liye. Yeh unki hukmarani ka aik bunyadi usool tha, jahan qanoon ki bala-dasti ke bajaye zaati itaat aur ehsan-mandi ko sab se oopar rakha gaya. Is ne mulk ke adliyati nizam ki azadi aur ghair-janibdari par gehre sawalat khade kar diye. Is video mein hum kuch aisi misalon par gaur karenge jahan adliya par Sharif khandan ke ghere asraat wazeh tor par dekhe ja sakte hain.

step_heading: Justice Malik Qayyum Ki Leaked Calls
text: Justice Malik Qayyum ki leaked phone calls Sharif khandan ke adliya par asraat ki aik numayan misal hain. Lahore High Court ke judge hotay hue, woh Shahbaz Sharif aur Saif ur Rehman se seedhi instructions le rahe the. In calls mein unhe bataya ja raha tha ke kis muqadmay mein kis ko kitni saza sunani hai aur kin logon ka "khayal rakhna" hai. Yeh waqia adliya ki azadi aur ghair-janibdari par gehre sawalat khare karta hai. Aik judge ka siyasi shakhsiyaton se is tarah ki hidayat lena, adliyati nizam mein seedhi dakhil-andazi ki nishani hai. Yeh wazeh karta hai ke kis tarah Sharif khandan adliyati faislon ko apni marzi ke mutabiq tabdeel karwa sakta tha. Is se poore adliyati dhaan-che par unke control ki tasveer wazeh hoti hai.

Justice Malik Qayyum ki Sharif khandan se wafadari sirf leaked calls tak mehdood nahi thi, balkay unke khandani rishtey bhi is baat ki tasdeeq karte hain. Unke bhai Pervez Malik PML-N ke taveel arse tak MLA rahe. Pervez Malik ki ahliya, Shahista Pervez, bhi MLA raheen. Aaj kal unke bete Ali Pervez Malik Sharif khandan ke inner circle mein apni jagah banane ke liye koshish kar rahe hain. Yeh rishtey wazeh tor par darust faislon ke bajaye zaati taluqaat aur siyasi faiday ki bunyad par adliyati faislon ke asraat ko ujagar karte hain. Is tarah ke taluqaat yeh zahir karte hain ke kis tarah Sharif khandan apne wafaadaron ko na sirf adliyati ohdon par faiz karta tha, balkay unke khandani afraad ko bhi siyasi aur sarkari ohdon par nawazta tha. Yeh tareeqa-e-kar adliya ki azadi ke liye aik shadeed khatra tha, jahan merit aur qanoon ke bajaye zaati ehsan aur siyasi taaluqaat ko tarjeeh di jati thi.

Sharif khandan ki adliya par control ki aik aur misal former President Rafiq Tarar ki hai. Sadar banne se pehle, woh Supreme Court ke judge the. Apne 3 saala tenure mein, Justice Tarar ne sirf aik faisla tehreer kiya, aur woh Nawaz Sharif ki hukumat ko bahaal karne ka tha. Khanadan-e-Sharifia ko unki yeh wafadari behad pasand aayi. Jab Chief Justice Sajjad Ali Shah ko farigh karne ka mansuba banaya gaya, toh Tarar sahib ne judges ko Chief Justice ke khilaf khara karne mein aham kirdar ada kiya. Nawaz Sharif ne unhe raat ke andhere mein aik special plane par Quetta bheja, taake woh wahan judges mein Chief Justice ke khilaf lobbying kar saken. Yeh misal wazeh karti hai ke kis tarah Sharif khandan adliyati ohdon par maujood afraad ki wafadari ko apne siyasi maqasid ke liye istemal karta tha aur badle mein unhe nawazta tha.

Rafiq Tarar ki wafadari ka sab se bara sila unko Sadar-e-Pakistan ke ohday par faiz karna tha. Jab Farooq Leghari ko farigh karke naye Sadar ke liye umeedwar ka intikhab karna tha, toh Mian Sharif ne Rafiq Tarar ko is zimmedari ke liye sab se behtar shakhs qarar diya. Unke farmanbardar beton ne baap ki khwahish ki laj rakhi aur Tarar PML-N ke sadarti umeedwar ban gaye. Lekin unke Awan-e-Sadar tak pahunchne mein aik rukawat samne aayi: us waqt ke Chief Election Commissioner ne unke kaghzat-e-namzadgi mustarad kar diye. Isi moqay par, Lahore High Court mein unka case Justice Malik Qayyum ke samne lagaya gaya â€“ wahi Malik Qayyum jin ki leaked calls ka zikr pehle kiya gaya tha. Justice Malik Qayyum ne hasb-e-tawaqqa Rafiq Tarar ko election larrne ki ijazat de di, jiske natije mein woh Sadar Pakistan ban gaye. Yeh waqia Sharif khandan ke adliya aur intikhabi nizam par ghere control ko wazeh karta hai.

Sharif khandan ki 'shahi ata' (royal favor) sirf wafaadar khaadim tak mehdood nahi rehti, balkay uske khandan aur nasal ko bhi apne chhatar-chhaya mein rakhti hai. Rafiq Tarar ki misal is baat ka saboot hai. Unki wafadari ke badle mein, unke khandan ke kai afraad aaj bhi qaumi assembly aur cabinet ke member hain. Atta Tarar wazeer-e-ittilaat hain, unke cousin Azam Nazir Tarar wazeer-e-qanoon hain. Chachi Saira MLA aur sabiq wazeer-e-sehat hain, jabke unke bhai Bilal sabiq MPA aur chachi ki bhabhi Muniba Iqbal member qaumi assembly hain. Yeh tareeqa-e-kar zahir karta hai ke kis tarah Sharif khandan apne wafaadaron ko aur unke khandani afraad ko siyasi aur sarkari ohdon par nawazta tha, jiske badle mein khaadimon ki nasal bhi malikon ki ehsanmand aur tabe rehti thi. Yeh system merit aur qanoon ke bajaye zaati taluqaat aur ehsan-mandi par mabni tha.
